item.title: Kevin add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Courage is resistance to fear, mastery of fear - not absence of fear." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Kevin add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Outside of a dog, a book is man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Kevin add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Kevin add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Finish each day and be done with it. You have done what you could. Some blunders and absurdities no doubt crept in; forget them as soon as you can. Tomorrow is a new day. You shall begin it serenely and with too high a spirit to be encumbered with your old nonsense." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Kevin add a quote by Arundhati Roy
item.description: "To love. To be loved. To never forget your own insignificance. To never get used to the unspeakable violence and the vulgar disparity of life around you. To seek joy in the saddest places. To pursue beauty to its lair. To never simplify what is complicated or complicate what is simple. To respect strength, never power. Above all, to watch. To try and understand. To never look away. And never, never to forget." -- Arundhati Roy

item.title: Kevin add a quote by Fyodor Dostoevsky
item.description: "What is hell? I maintain that it is the suffering of being unable to love." -- Fyodor Dostoevsky

item.title: Kevin add a quote by Lewis Carroll
item.description: "The time has come," the walrus said, "to talk of many things: Of shoes and ships - and sealing wax - of cabbages and kings" -- Lewis Carroll

item.title: Kevin add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Be yourself; everyone else is already taken." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Kevin add a quote by Steven Wright
item.description: "Everywhere is walking distance if you have the time." -- Steven Wright

item.title: Kevin add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "There is no greater agony than bearing an untold story inside you." -- Maya Angelou
